segments.text: When is your vacation going to start ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll be leaving on the fifth of August for the vacation
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's only a few days from now ! How many weeks are you going to be taking ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm taking two weeks now . but I want to save the other week and take it sometime during the winter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you made your hotel reservation yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I don't need to do that . I'll be staying with friends
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're lucky . It's hard to find a place to stay at the beach in August
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just think , in a few days , I'll be swimming and lying in the sun and just taking it easy .
segments.speaker: S2
